name: カスタムメイト
summary: A young man finds a mysterious box. Making sure no one is at home, he opens the box and finds a scroll with a magic incantation inside. He chants the magic spell - and immediately a cute female elf appears. She says she can create any girl the hero wants. But once the girl is created, he has to figure out how to win her good graces...
info:
• 别名: Custom Mate
  • 平台: PC98
  • 平台: FM TOWNS
  • 游戏类型: ADV
  • 发行日期: 1993-09-17
  • ブランド: Cocktail Soft
